item.title: About
item.description: I’m a Software Architect who loves to build great team with a that makes a difference in the businesses that need them. I’ve been working in the Microsoft domain since starting with .NET over 8 years ago and I’m interested in Management , Agile Methodology , Microservices, DDD, TDD, BDD, Event Sourcing , Event Storming , Event Modeling , SOA . I work hard to apply my core knowledge of Agile, .
